title: Black Lies
description: Can you love two men at once? Is there any future in that?Brant loves me fiercely. A brilliant tech billionaire who has spent the last four years pursuing me, he's the man I should marry, yet I keep turning down his proposals.Lee... I don't know what to say about Lee. I pursue him recklessly, and he uses me in ways that would make a nun swear. He isn't in love with me yet, but he will be. He has to be.Go ahead, judge me. You have no idea what my love entails.If you think you've heard this story before, trust me - you haven't.
author: Alessandra Torre
